text: Andrej Kiska (born 2 February 1963) is a Slovak philanthropist, entrepreneur and politician. He became the President of Slovakia following 2014 Slovak presidential election. He ran as independent. He was appointed to the office on 15 June, 2014. ==References== ==Other websites== Category:1963 births Category:Living people Category:Business people Category:People from Poprad Category:European philanthropists Category:Presidents of Slovakia
title: Andrej Kiska
